original_title: The Books of Knjige: Sluƒçajevi Pravde
overview: Who left a dead body on a farm of truck driver's of which the best quality milk is made? Who smuggles illegal Betangin tablets? Who set on fire policemen's hands? Why does the ominous rabbit shows up? Two brave but incompetent police inspectors are trying to find out all of this.
title: The Books of Knjige: Cases of Justice
